abstract: Bank of America, after setting off firestorm of criticism, is rethinking elements of its plan to charge customers $5 per month to use their debit cards; bank is likely to broaden number of customers exempt from fee.
snippet: After setting off a firestorm of criticism from consumers and the White House, Bank of America is rethinking a plan to charge customers $5 a month to use their debit cards.
lead_paragraph: After setting off a firestorm of criticism from consumers and the White House, Bank of America is rethinking a plan to charge customers $5 a month to use their debit cards.

headline.main: Bank of America Rethinking Debit Card Fee
headline.print_headline: Major Bank Rethinks Fee On Debit Card
headline.seo: Bank of America Rethinking Debit Card Fee
